title: Cosmic Skateboard
summaries: The Cosmic Skateboard is a pet-summoning item that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Martian Saucer in Master Mode. It summons an Alien Skater that will follow the player around.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons an alien skater
'Kickflips are a lot easier in Zero-G!'
statistics.Sell: 5
